Although recent advance make antiviral therapy AIDS , currently cure AIDS . It likely ultimate control disease depend development safe effective vaccine HIV .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Multicenter Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity Vaccinia Derived HIV-1 Recombinant Envelope Glycoprotein ( gp160 ) Human Immunodeficiency Virus : Evaluation 200-mcg Dose
DOC.detailed_description: Although recent advance make antiviral therapy AIDS , currently cure AIDS . It likely ultimate control disease depend development safe effective vaccine HIV . Healthy , adult volunteer without identifiable high-risk behavior HIV-1 infection randomly assign receive three injection either 200 mcg gp160 vaccine placebo . At participate site , four volunteer receive vaccine two volunteer receive placebo . Primary immunization two booster immunization day 30 day 180 do outpatient set . Volunteers closely monitor first 2 week postimmunization ( primary booster ) , extensively follow 2 year . Volunteers may offer additional booster preparation 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Normal , healthy , HIVnegative adult fully comprehend purpose detail study . Available 2 year followup . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow condition symptom exclude : History positive PPD ( tuberculin test ) abnormal chest xray . Positive syphilis serology ( e.g. , RPR ) . Positive circulate hepatitis B surface antigen . Patients follow exclude : They sexual partner identifiable highrisk behavior HIV infection . History immunodeficiency chronic illness . Evidence psychological psychiatric problem may lead noncompliance . Prior Medication : Excluded : Immunosuppressive medication . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Blood transfusion cryoprecipitates within past 6 month .
